name: RP3 Agency
tagline: We are builders of business opportunity.
description:
RP3 is a creative agency in the D.C. metro area focused on building new ideas, technologies and experiences. We forge meaningful connections between people and brands, and create opportunities that propel businesses forward.
Under the leadership of Beth Johnson and Jim Lansbury, RP3 has grown into one of the region’s most respected creative agencies. We believe that brilliant creative comes from brilliant strategy, and we work tirelessly to build a culture of curiosity at RP3 that values talented people, great ideas and solid business results.
We’re fortunate to work with a variety of forward-thinking clients who are as passionate as we are about creating opportunity for their organizations, their customers, and their stakeholders. Current clients include Norfolk Southern, Johns Hopkins Medicine, Long and Foster, Children's National Health System and more.
While we choose not to specialize in any particular category, our collective experience runs especially deep in Health Care, Travel and Destination, Food and Restaurant, Automotive, Sports, and Retail.
